5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: This hadith has been reported by 'Auza'i with the same chain of transmitters:We used to slaughter the camel during the lifetime of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) after the 'Asr prayer, but he made no mention of:" We used to pray along with him

chapter.eng-name: It is recommended to pray `Asr early
